title: TRANSFER ACCOUNT
body:
Can someone please tell me when I WILL BE ABLE TO CHANGE REGION ?
ITS DECEMBER 9 AND STILL NOTHING
RIOT SAID IN NOVEMBER! 
This is getting annoying, can someone give me A DATE SO I KNOW !

replies.body:
" We ran into some issues with how our data centers communicate with each other, and our engineers estimate it will take at least 5 to 6 weeks to be fixed. We're really sorry about this."

[Official Riot post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update)
